comments:

This was noted in bug https://bugs.eclipse.org/bugs/show_bug.cgi?id=124728 but opened here as a separate bug.
Rob, i have released fix for this defect.

Hmmm, I am not able to repro this using the same build (must require a more specific repro) ; Neeraj, I'm going to send this over to you for resolution since it involves a method you recently modified (note: looks like a null check was just added for "model" to getUnSelectedClassPathElementsForJ2EEDependency() but a corresponding check was not added to getUnSelectedClassPathElementsForWebDependency())
released fix for the next build.
Setting hot bug priorities to at least P2.
